title: Samsung Display is working on a brighter OLED panel for iPads
content:
Many people perceive Samsung and Apple as two hateful enemies. In some ways, that’s true — as the two corporations have been rivaling each other for years. However, behind the scenes, the two tech giants sign mutually-beneficial deals that sustain both of their businesses. For example, Apple’s biggest OLED screen supplier is, in fact, Samsung.

The post Samsung Display is working on a brighter OLED panel for iPads appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung Display is working on an OLED panel with two emission layers in hopes of winning orders from Apple for future iPads.
